inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Having participated in the investigators' original HPV study in 2010
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women aged 18-35 years, matched those of SLE patients recruited

inclusion.criterion: Having participated in our HPV study in 2010

notes: A 54-year-old woman with abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion, positive for HPV 16, and menopausal. She smokes and drinks alcohol frequently.
